text: "Lean on Me" is a song written and recorded by American singer-songwriter Bill Withers. It was released in April 1972. It was the first single from his second album, Still Bill. It was his first and only number one single on both the soul singles and the Billboard Hot 100. Billboard ranked it as the No. 7 song of 1972.Billboard Year-End Hot 100 singles of 1972 It is ranked number 208 on Rolling Stones list of "The 500 Greatest Songs of All Time". Many other versions have been recorded, and it is one of only nine songs to have reached No. 1 in the US Singles Charts with versions recorded by two different artists. ==References== Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soul ballads Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Bill Withers songs Category:Mary J. Blige songs Category:Michael Bolton songs Category:Bonnie Tyler songs Category:Keith Urban songs
title: Lean on Me (song)
